CHAT.comment: Chi and Mot sit facing one another with little Bro standing behind Mot. Chi decodes well and enunciates clearly , though his delivery sounds a bit choppy. He omits one line toward the beginning of the story. Mot corrects Chi once , but otherwise stays in the background and allows Chi to take ownership of the book reading. A good deal of Mot's attention goes toward quieting Bro who tries to participate in book reading
